property.caption: Data source type
property.description: The method for retrieving the objects.

property.caption: Datasource entity
property.description: The entity of which the checkbox list will be composed.

property.caption: XPath constraint
property.description: Optional constraint to filter the available options

property.caption: Show Label
property.description: Show a label for the field.

property.caption: Label Caption
property.description: Specify the caption to use for the field

property.caption: Sort attribute(XPath)
property.description: This fields provides the sort attribute of the list.

property.caption: Sort order(XPath)
property.description: The sort order.

property.caption: Display attribute
property.description: The display attribute of the checkbox option.

property.caption: Form orientation
property.description: The orientation of the label and checkbox items

property.caption: Direction
property.description: This field determines the display direction.

property.caption: Items per column
property.description: (Vertical only) If this is larger than zero, the number of items shown per column. If zero, all items will go in one column.

property.caption: Label Width (weight)
property.description: The column size of the label control (only applied with horizontal orientation)

property.caption: Show More count
property.description: If this is larger than zero, only that amount of items will be shown first. All others will behind a Show More button.

property.caption: Sort on checked
property.description: This will sort the checkboxes based on the checked value. All items that are checked, will be placed first

property.caption: Add Select All
property.description: Add a 'Select All' checkbox at the top of the option list

property.caption: Read only
property.description: The checkboxes are read only if selected

property.caption: Icon Checkboxes
property.description: If selected, the checkboxes are rendered as icons instead of regular checkbox inputs.

property.caption: Icon class
property.description: Classes that need to be on the checkboxes all the time (like glyphicon or fa)

property.caption: Icon when checked
property.description: Classes to add to the icon when checked (default: glyphicon glyphicon-check)

property.caption: Icon when unchecked
property.description: Classes to add to the icon when not checked (default: glyphicon glyphicon-unchecked)

property.caption: On change
property.description: Run this microflow when an item is ticked or unticked

property.caption: On change delay
property.description: A delay (in ms) for the onchange microflow to be triggered. This can be used to provide smoother UX.
